          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">An English Pub - Food 1</string>
            <string language="en">An English Pub - Food 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Englische Publikation - Nahrung 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Publication Anglaise - Nourriture 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Publicação Inglesa - Alimento 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una Pubblicazione Inglese - Alimento 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα αγγλικό μπαρ - τρόφιμα 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Publicación Inglesa - Alimento 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can read and listen to a text about the strange names on the menus in English pubs.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can read and listen to a text about the strange names on the menus in English pubs. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">leisure</string>
            <string language="sv">activities</string>
            <string language="sv">pub</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">leisure</string>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
            <string language="en">pub</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie zu einem Text über die 
merkwürdigen Namen auf den Menüs in englischen Publikationen lesen 
und hören. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez lire et écouter un texte au
sujet des noms étranges sur les menus en publications anglaises. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les débutants - module 5 -
qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode ler e escutar um texto sobre os 
nomes estranhos nos menus em publicações inglesas. Safir - 
vida do inglês e de funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que 
são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete leggere ed ascoltare un testo circa i 
nomi sconosciuti sui menu in pubblicazioni inglesi. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε και να ακούσετε ένα 
κείμενο για τα παράξενα ονόματα στους καταλόγους επιλογής στα 
αγγλικά μπαρ. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή
για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede leer y escuchar un texto sobre 
los nombres extraños en los menús en las publicaciones inglesas. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
